content: rose cotton headband - by bodil mattsson for questions about the pattern please email bodilemattsson99@gmail com 1 overview the headband is knitted flat with a delicate lace motif and i- cord bands for tying it around the head the lace itself is a four row repeat it is a great stash buster as it uses very little yarn less than half a skein of sandnes garn tynn line materials 2 5 mm dpn needles 50 g sandnes garn tynn line or any equivalent fingering weight yarn abbreviations k knit p purl st stitch sts stitches lhn left hand needle k3tog knit 3 together yo yarn over k2tog knit 2 together chart 1 2 pattern i-cord band cast on 5 sts work i-cord with these 5 sts until it reaches 25 cm increases & set up rounds row 1 ws purl row 2 rs k1 with lhn insert from the back and pick up the bar between the sts and knit this new st knit until 1 st remains with lhn insert from the front and pick up the bar between the sts and knit this new st through the back loop k1 repeat row 1 and 2 six more times =19 sts on the needle main work & repeat sequence if you prefer charts follow chart 1 row 1 rs k3 p2 k3tog yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo slip 2 sts knitwise k1 pull the 2 slip sts over the knitted st p2 k3 row 2 ws p3 k2 p13 k2 p3 row 3 rs k3 p2 k13 p2 k3 row 4 ws p3 k2 p13 k2 p3 repeat row 1-4 until the work reaches 25 cm 22 repeats of the lace pattern decreases row 1 rs k1 k2tog knit until 3 sts remains k2tog k1 row 2 ws purl all sts work row 1 and 2 until 5 sts remains i-cord band work i-cord with 5 sts bind off weave in ends block and enjoy 3
